Package controller

Class InternshipController

java.lang.Object
controller.InternshipController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompanyInternshipManagementService, StaffInternshipApprovalService
public class InternshipController extends Object implements CompanyInternshipManagementService, StaffInternshipApprovalService
Manages internship opportunities and persistence. loads/saves opportunities, handles rules for creation/update/deletion/visibility Approves/rejects offerings for staff
